inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis diagnosed by either of the following in a patient with chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Radiologic evidence of varices, cirrhosis or portal hypertension
inclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CLL and large cell transformation. He has been treated with various therapies but has not had a significant response. He is currently experiencing a rising white count and mildly elevated LDH.
